channel.title: Near-Blank PI and a 508/525?
channel.description:
What I want in the PI: -No NPC's in the autospawn.cfg -No Objects spawned via server sided -Full item.cfg for a 317/377 cache -Just combat skills added (This isn't needed, but I'd like to have the least amount of skills in as possible, I don't know how to write the combat methods so that's why I want them in still). -No commands (they can be added by me :P) -No dialogues -No Action buttons (aside from logging out) -No clicking buttons (^) And Just generally clean. Netty would be a nice touch, and dupe fixes, but hey, I can't ask for the world right? On top of that, I'd like to get a 317 client with the 317 or 377 cache that can actually be edited, the cache I normally get is corrupted for some reason.
[hr][hr][hr]
I just want a 508 or 525 that's completely working. No, I don't want it to be 100% done. I want one that if I wanted, I could change the IP and some names, jar it, and it'd be online fine. I've tried to download some in the past, but they didn't like me and I didn't fix em.

item.title: Near-Blank PI and a 508/525?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

What I want in the PI:
-No NPC’s in the autospawn.cfg
-No Objects spawned via server sided
-Full item.cfg for a 317/377 cache
-Just combat skills added (This isn’t needed, but I’d like to have the least amount of skills in as possible, I don’t know how to write the combat methods so that’s why I want them in still).
-No commands (they can be added by me :P)
-No dialogues
-No Action buttons (aside from logging out)
-No clicking buttons (^)
And Just generally clean. Netty would be a nice touch, and dupe fixes, but hey, I can’t ask for the world right?
On top of that, I’d like to get a 317 client with the 317 or 377 cache that can actually be edited, the cache I normally get is corrupted for some reason.

[hr][hr][hr]

I just want a 508 or 525 that’s completely working. No, I don’t want it to be 100% done. I want one that if I wanted, I could change the IP and some names, jar it, and it’d be online fine.
I’ve tried to download some in the past, but they didn’t like me and I didn’t fix em.

Read full topic
